column4: Hi all, I have an Ati X700 and I have following problems: poor performance using composite (is lower performance than a GF2 Mx 200 at Compiz), I setup a dual-view display, question, I can go the mouse only in first display, the second one has a different GNOME and I don't know how to move windows to it. In Windows I can drag-drop in different displays, any ideas?
ati has poor support under linux
the card may be better, but a 5200 is supported better with linux
It's ugly then, I'll use the 3D from Vista or Windows :(
